title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Anti-Patriotism is a foundation of the left. George Foreman tweets his love for America. The Left is moving on from tearing down statutes to attacking the American flag. Why are the people in power so unhappy with our country? Rep. Byron Donalds (R-FL) responds to Rep. Cori Bush's July 4 tweet. Politics is the religious belief of the left. Montage of college students who are embarrassed to be Americans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
